conditions.Description: JSON array defining what should happen if the conditions match.
Used for sorting conditions on the conditions wizard and to define on which order the conditions will be executed.
Execute the action when all conditions match or at least one condition matches. All means the action will be executed only when all conditions match.
Conditions that should match before action can be executed. Defined in a JSON array.
Set this to 1 to disable this condition.

control_2co.Description: Currency to be used in product prices.
If this is a donation form this is the text that will be shown as label.
Users can select only one product or multiple products. Yes means they can buy many products.
This is a donation form for a non-profit organization. Yes means donation. No can be used to get non-donation payments with changeable prices.
Position of this question in the form. Starts from 0. Example: First question is 0, and the second question is 1.
Is this form selling products, collecting donations or setting up subscription payments?
Show the total amount on the form after the products. Yes means the total will be shown. No means they will not be shown.
Question Text: Label for the form questions.

control_address.Description: Position of this question in the form. Starts from 0. Example: First question is 0, and the second question is 1.

control_filepickerIO.Description: Can the user upload more than one file?
Display a modal dialog box for selecting files instead of a new window.
Specifies which service to show upon opening. If not set, the user is shown their most recently used location, or otherwise the computer upload page.
Position of this question in the form. Starts from 0. Example: First question is 0, and the second question is 1.
Amazon S3 Bucket Name if S3 is used for uploads
The file should be stored in a way that allows public or private access when using the S3 file URL directly.
The path to store the file on S3 Bucket. By default it stores file at {Bucket}/JotForm/FormID/ folder. If you wish to attach the FormID include the {formID} to the full path string.
Which services should be available to the user.

control_fileupload.Description: Text used on the upload button

emails.Description: From email address on emails. This will only work if the email address is validated on the account.
Send email in HTML or plan text format. Set it to 1 if the email is HTML.

form.Description: Font Size: Change font size
Payment form product options in JSON format.
Submission Limit: Limit the number of total submissions (e.g. 1000)
Set a message for forms which are expired or limited.
Send HTTP POST data to Thank You Page. If you set this to Yes the data is posted on the page where the user is redirected after the form submission.
What happens when someone submits the form. default shows them a default thank you message. thanktext and thankurl allows you to customize the thank you message or redirect user to another page.
Alignment of form question labels and form input fields.
Disable form on a date. Format: 2012-10-30 13:00.
Font face for the form labels. Example: Tahoma
Color of the fonts used on question labels on the form.
Width of the Form in pixels.
Highlight Effect: Yellow background effect on focused inputs
Width of the question labels on the form in pixels.
Spaces between questions
Page Title of the form.
Theme used in the form. ie: Default, Pastel.
Thank you message shown after the form submission. activeRedirect must be set as thanktext for this to be active.
Check uniqueness of submission. Loose check only uses cookies. Strict checks the IP address of the user as well.
Unique Question: Do not allow previously entered values.
Background color of the form.
Should the form be secure by default?
Expire form on yyyy-mm-dd.
Inject Custom CSS code to a form.
Enable or Disable a form.
Thank You URL: Redirect user to a page after submission

products.Description: Trial period in subscriptions to allow a period of time before starting charging the credit card.

Product ID created by the Jotform form builder.
Number of times a subscription should be charged before getting expired.
Setup Fee: First payment on subscription payments.
